news.title: Fed's Bostic says he's 'leaning' toward just one rate cut this year
news.summary: Bostic's comments come after a consumer sentiment survey last week showed Americans were worried about the potential of tariffs to push inflation higher. Bostic: "I don't think there's any reason to think that the impact of tariffs on inflation is going to be much higher than it already is"

news.title: Bath & Body Works names recent Nike executive as its new CEO, effective immediately
news.summary: Daniel Heaf was most recently Nike's chief transformation and strategy officer. His role was eliminated by the sneaker giant's new CEO Elliott Hill.

news.title: Nvidia announces new tech to keep it at the center of AI development
news.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang made a slew of announcements and revealed new products on Monday. The company is aiming to sustain its leadership in AI computing.

news.title: Tariffs could signal decline of American influence in the world: Robert Reich
news.summary: President Donald Trump's economic policy agenda could signal the end of U.S. influence, Robert Reich said in a recent episode of "The Bottom Line"

news.title: Warren Buffett will not take the stage at next year's Berkshire Hathaway shareholder meeting
news.summary: The meeting will still take place in Omaha, Nebraska, and feature questions from shareholders. Greg Abel will be the CEO fielding questions. The meeting will take place on Wednesday.

news.title: Is America the next Cyprus? Only one other Double-A rated country has ever defaulted
news.summary: zero countries with a triple-A rating defaulted within 10 years of getting that gold-standard approval. Have a look at the default rate of sovereign issuers.

news.title: Here’s the secret to valuing a startup investment like a venture capitalist
news.summary: Early-stage bets are, more than anything, bets on leadership. This is what to look for. Early-stage investments are more about leadership than about business.

news.title: I have $50,000 in credit-card debt after my divorce, but received $30,000 after a car wreck. Do I buy a used Lexus?
news.summary: “I previously drove a fully loaded BMW X7, and driving a used Lexus feels like a big drop,” he says.

news.title: I’m 57 and ready to retire next year on $7,500 a month, but my wife says no. Who’s right?
news.summary: “I also have $300,000 in a 401(k),” he says. “My wife has a 403(b) that currently sits at $650,000.”

news.title: 23andMe sells its most valuable asset. Regeneron promises to keep your DNA private.
news.summary: Regeneron said it will continue uninterrupted service of 23andMe’s consumer genome services after its purchase closes as expected in the third quarter of this year.
